values: TX Gov. Greg Abbott / TX A.G. Ken Paxton / Dr. Pete Chambers

In an interview from India, Gov. Greg Abbott says ten other states have sent National Guard to the Texas border, and others will follow. Abbott says he is “prepared” for a conflict with federal authorities.
On Monday, a convoy of ordinary citizens will head to the border to protect it from an invasion of military-aged males. Where will Greg Abbott be?
